text: Plectochitina is an extinct genus of chitinozoans. It was described by Fritz H. Cramer in 1964.Plectochitina at ChitDB: Chitinozoans of Baltica.Cramer, Fritz H. (1966) "Chitinozoans of a composite section of Upper Llandoverian to basal Lower Gedinnian sediments in northern Leon, Spain. A preliminary report". Bulletin de la Société belge Géologie de Paléontologie et D'Hydrologie. 75 pages 69–129. ==Species== * Plectochitina magna (Nestor, 1982) * Plectochitina nodifera (Nestor, 1980) * Plectochitina obuti Nestor, 1994 * Plectochitina pachyderma (Laufeld, 1974) * Plectochitina ralphi Nestor, 1994 * Plectochitina spongiosa (Achab, 1977) ==References== Category:Prehistoric marine animals Category:Fossil taxa described in 1964
title: Plectochitina
